title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL

items.title: Some ant architects design a colony to cut the risk of disease. Humans, take note!
items.description: One kind of tiny ant can serve as a monumental example for how to keep members of a community safe from pathogens. A new study shows how they do it.

items.title: France Sends Former President Nicolas Sarkozy to Prison to Start 5-Year Sentence
items.description: Nicolas Sarkozy, the president of France from 2007 to 2012, received a five-year sentence after being convicted in a campaign finance scandal.
